item.title: WATER SEPARATORS – FREIGHTER WITH DRAW-THROUGH SMOKE DETECTION SYSTEM

remarks.para: May be inoperative with coalescer bag removed provided associated pack is not used.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Lower lobe cargo A/C FLOW RATE (if installed) remains OFF.
Carriage of animals and perishables in associated cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard " ______ PACK WATER SEPARATOR COALESCER REMOVED" below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel. Also placard "_____PACK INOP" next to affected pack switch on P-5 panel. Enter Items in Aircraft Deferred item Log.

numlitem.para: Remove the associated water coalescer bag (AMM 21-51-05/701).
